ComicInfo.Title: Two
ComicInfo.Summary: By F. Solano Lopez, Pol, and R. Barreiro. In love with a young villager, Lilith gives the light to Lulabeth, who quickly reaches a happy puberty. It soon becomes evident that Lulabeth has not inherited her mother's powers. Filled with guilt that leads to madness, she kills her mother to procreate with her father. From this encounter Bethanny is born, one of the most powerful witches in the lineage. Possessing an irresistible beauty, Bethanny soon learns to deceive men and to use them at her convenience. But her excessive confidence results in a premature death. An old druid magician revives her sufficiently to pass the light to Tamara. Young Witches is the best-selling Eros comic ever, and this volume features the most sex and richest detailed halftoned art so far.
